projects.name: Smart Traffic Optimizer
projects.description: Intelligent system to optimize urban traffic flow using IoT sensors and predictive models.
projects.productivity_comment: The team maintained good efficiency despite some interruptions due to frequent meetings.

projects.name: AI-Powered Code Review
projects.description: AI-based tool for automated code analysis and improvement.
projects.productivity_comment: Stable productivity, but pair programming sessions are often interrupted by non-essential calls.

projects.name: Cybersecurity Threat Analyzer
projects.description: Platform for real-time detection and analysis of cybersecurity threats.
projects.productivity_comment: High productivity driven by effective scheduling of calls during peak focus times.

projects.name: Quantum Circuit Simulator
projects.description: Advanced simulator for quantum circuits, useful for research and education.
projects.productivity_comment: Productivity has been hindered by an excessive number of meetings spread out inefficiently.

projects.name: Distributed Data Lake Manager
projects.description: System for managing and orchestrating distributed data lakes in multi-cloud environments.
projects.productivity_comment: Good balance between focused work and alignment time, although there's room to optimize call scheduling.

projects.name: Augmented Reality Maintenance Assistant
projects.description: AR assistant to support technical maintenance in industrial environments.
projects.productivity_comment: Productivity is increasing, but a more careful call scheduling is recommended.
